0.text: Innate: Janna gains  6% bonus movement speed while facing nearby allied  champions, and grants them the same amount while they are facing her.
0.html: Innate: Janna gains  6% bonus movement speed while facing nearby allied champions, and grants them the same amount while they are facing her.
markedPassages: 6% bonus movement speed
champions

0.text: Active: Janna summons a whirlwind at her current location that charges up over 3 seconds, increasing its range, speed, damage, and  knock up duration every second over the duration. Howling Gale's direction is determined by this cast.
0.html: Active: Janna summons a whirlwind at her current location that charges up over 3 seconds, increasing its range, speed, damage, and knock up duration every second over the duration. Howling Gale's direction is determined by this cast.
markedPassages: knock up

1.text: Howling Gale can be recast at any time within the duration, and does so automatically after the duration.
1.html: Howling Gale can be recast at any time within the duration, and does so automatically after the duration.

2.text: Recast: Janna launches the whirlwind in the direction she targeted over 1.25 seconds, dealing magic damage to enemies hit and  knocking them up for 0.5 − 1.25 (based on seconds charged) seconds.
2.html: Recast: Janna launches the whirlwind in the direction she targeted over 1.25 seconds, dealing magic damage to enemies hit and knocking them up for 0.5 − 1.25 (based on seconds charged) seconds.
markedPassages: knocking them up

0.text: Passive: While Zephyr is not on cooldown, Janna is  ghosted and gains  bonus movement speed.
0.html: Passive: While Zephyr is not on cooldown, Janna is ghosted and gains  bonus movement speed.
markedPassages: ghosted
bonus movement speed

1.text: Active: Janna sends an air elemental at the target enemy that deals magic damage and  slows them for 3 seconds, capped at 99%.
1.html: Active: Janna sends an air elemental at the target enemy that deals magic damage and slows them for 3 seconds, capped at 99%.
markedPassages: slows

0.text: Passive: Whenever Janna's abilities  slow or  knock up at least one enemy  champion, she gains 15%  heal and shield power for 4 seconds. This may occur only once per cast.
0.html: Passive: Whenever Janna's abilities slow or knock up at least one enemy champion, she gains 15%  heal and shield power for 4 seconds. This may occur only once per cast.
markedPassages: slow
knock up
champion
heal and shield power

1.text: Active: Janna grants the target allied champion,  turret, or herself a  shield for 5 seconds, decaying after 1.25 seconds.
1.html: Active: Janna grants the target allied champion, turret, or herself a shield for 5 seconds, decaying after 1.25 seconds.
markedPassages: turret
shield

2.text: While the shield holds, the target gains  bonus attack damage.
2.html: While the shield holds, the target gains  bonus attack damage.
markedPassages: bonus attack damage

0.text: Active: Janna unleashes a blast that  knocks back all nearby enemies to up to 875 units over 0.5 seconds based on their proximity, though not through terrain.
0.html: Active: Janna unleashes a blast that knocks back all nearby enemies to up to 875 units over 0.5 seconds based on their proximity, though not through terrain.
markedPassages: knocks back

1.text: Janna also  channels for up to 3 seconds,  healing nearby allies every 0.25 seconds.

consume.originHTML:
Active

Unique – Trinket: Consume a charge to place an invisible Totem Ward at the target location, which grants sight of the surrounding area for 90 − 120 (based on average champion level) seconds (210 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds recharge time; 2 charges; 600 range).

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+8 ability power
+10 health
+50% base mana regeneration
+ 2 per 10 seconds

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Tribute: Grants a charge every 10 seconds, up to 3 charges. If an allied champion is nearby, damaging basic attacks and abilities against champions and structures consume a charge, up to one per attack or cast. Consuming a charge grants 20. Receive diminishing gold from excessive minion kills.
Unique – Quest: Earn 500 using this item to upgrade to Frostfang, gaining the Warding active with 3 wards in stock.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – TRIBUTE: Grants a charge every 10 seconds, up to 3 charges. If an allied champion is nearby, damaging basic attacks and abilities against champions and structures consume a charge, up to one per attack or cast. Consuming a charge grants  20. Receive diminishing gold from excessive minion kills.

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+40 ability power
+20 ability haste
+200 health
+100% base mana regeneration

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Starlit Grace: When affecting champions with attacks or abilities in combat, heal the nearby allied champion (excluding yourself) with the most missing health for 60 (2 second cooldown).
Each second spent in combat with champions grants 5% heal and shield power, stacking up to 4 times for maximum of 20%.
Mythic Passive: Empowers each of your other Legendary items with 8 increased heal for Starlit Grace.
passive.originText:
UNIQUE – STARLIT GRACE: When affecting champions with attacks or abilities in combat,  heal the nearby allied champion (excluding yourself) with the most missing health for 60 (2 second cooldown).
Each second spent in combat with champions grants 5% heal and shield power, stacking up to 4 times for maximum of 20%.

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+15 ability haste
+200 health
+100% base mana regeneration

active.originHTML:
Active

Unique – Intervention: Call upon a beam of light to strike upon the target location after 2.5 seconds, granting sight of the area for the duration. Allies within the area are healed for 180 − 340 (based on target's level), while enemy champions within take 10% of target's maximum health as true damage. Can be used while dead. (90 second cooldown; 5500 range).
active.originText: UNIQUE – INTERVENTION: Call upon a beam of light to strike upon the target location after 2.5 seconds, granting  sight of the area for the duration. (90 second cooldown; 5500 range).

Passive
